metadata.title: CVE-2023-49441 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
dnsmasq 2.9 is vulnerable to Integer Overflow via forward_query.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-49441` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dnsmasq - 2.90-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
dnsmasq-base - 2.90-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
dnsmasq-base-lua - 2.90-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
dnsmasq-utils - 2.90-0ubuntu0.22.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dnsmasq package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.90-0ubuntu0.22.04.1').
